name: Combat Train-ing
description:
Can you hobble together some weapons to help get rid of the evil monsters on this train? Hell the least you could do is throw some rocks at em! Completed for the Boss Rush Game Jam 2022.

Controls -

W - Jump

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

Spacebar - Horizontal Dash

V - Melee (Levels 1 and 2)

Left Click - Shoot (Levels 3 and 4)

Thanks for checking out my game! I hope you enjoy it.
